description: Generalized distribution and spawning areas of monk (Lophius spp.) adapted from a map provided by the Geological Survey of Namibia for the Atlas of Namibia (Mendelsohn J, Jarvis A, Roberts C and Robertson T. 2002. Atlas of Namibia: A portrait of the land and its people. David Philip Publishers, Cape Town, South Africa.)
keywords: Atlas, Namibia, Oceans | Aquatic Sciences | Fisheries
name: Namibia: Distribution of monkfish
